name: aMAZEing duo
description:
Reach the end of the labyrinth in collaboration with your mate but remember, you can't do it alone because one of you is blind and the other one is deaf!

Movements: WASD/Arrows

It is recommended to use headphones while playing, expecially if both of the players are in the same room  :)

ATTENTION! aMAZEing duo is a 2-players game. If you want to play this game you need to be in two with two different computers. The game should be played while talking/messaging to each other so it's important the two players have a form of communication to use. 

Post scriptum. For the people who were here since the beginning, peppa to everyone.
